sections.en: The leader begins by saying: “Gentlemen, let us say the blessing:

comments.en:
Let the name of the LORD be blessed
now and forever.
comments.he: יְהִ֤י שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֣ה מְבֹרָ֑ךְ מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃

sections.en: The others respond: The Name of Adonoy will be blessed from now forever.
sections.he: המסובים עונים: יְהִי שֵׁם יְהֹוָה מְבֹרָךְ מֵעַתָּה וְעַד־עוֹלָם:

comments.en:
Let the name of the LORD be blessed
now and forever.
comments.he: יְהִ֤י שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֣ה מְבֹרָ֑ךְ מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃

sections.en: The leader repeats: “The Name of Adonoy will be blessed from now forever.”
sections.he: וחוזר המזמן: יְהִי שֵׁם יְהֹוָה מְבֹרָךְ מֵעַתָּה וְעַד־עוֹלָם:

sections.en: “With your permission our masters and teachers, Let us bless (our God,) Him, for we have eaten of His bounty.”
sections.he: בִּרְשׁוּת מָרָנָן וְרַבָּנָן וְרַבּוֹתַי נְבָרֵךְ (בעשרה אֱלֺהֵֽינוּ) שֶׁאָכַֽלְנוּ מִשֶּׁלּוֹ:

comments.en: I יהוה am your God who brought you out from the land of the Egyptians to be their slaves no more, who broke the bars of your yoke and made you walk erect.
comments.he: אֲנִ֞י יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם אֲשֶׁ֨ר הוֹצֵ֤אתִי אֶתְכֶם֙ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרַ֔יִם מִֽהְיֹ֥ת לָהֶ֖ם עֲבָדִ֑ים וָאֶשְׁבֹּר֙ מֹטֹ֣ת עֻלְּכֶ֔ם וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ אֶתְכֶ֖ם קֽוֹמְמִיּֽוּת׃ {פ}

sections.en: The others respond accordingly: Blessed is (our God) He for we have eaten of His bounty and through His goodness we live.
sections.he: המסובים עונים: בָּרוּךְ (בעשרה אֱלֺהֵֽינוּ) שֶֽׁאָכַֽלְנוּ מִשֶּׁלּוֹ וּבְטוּבוֹ חָיִֽינוּ:

sections.en: One who did not eat, responds: Blessed is (our God) He, and His Name constantly, forever and ever.
sections.he: מי שלא אכל עונה: בָּרוּךְ (בעשרה או יותר אֱלֹהֵינוּ) וּמְבוֹרָךְ שְׁמוֹ תָּמִיד לְעוֹלָם וָעֶד:

sections.en: The leader repeats: “Blessed is (our God) He for we have eaten of His bounty and through His goodness we live.”
sections.he: וחוזר המזמן: בָּרוּךְ (בעשרה אֱלֺהֵֽינוּ) שֶֽׁאָכַֽלְנוּ מִשֶּׁלּוֹ וּבְטוּבוֹ חָיִֽינוּ:

sections.en: Some add: Blessed is He and blessed is His Name.
